Functions
BG_FillArray
void BG_FillArray(
void *arr,
uint arr_len,
size_t struct_size,
void *arr_value,
int arr_type
)

Fill any type of array with provided value.

Parameters
arr
void*

Input Array to fill.

arr_len
uint

Length of array.

struct_size
size_t

Size of structure . [Optional. Required only when data type of type Struct, otherwise ignored.]

arr_value
void*

Pointer to value that you want to fill in array.

arr_type
int

Data type of array and value . Use Enum 'DATA_TYPE' to provide value.

void *arr_dest,
void *arr_src,
uint arr_size
)

Convert 1d array to 2d array or vice versa.

Parameters
arr_dest
void*

[Output]  Destination array.

arr_src
void*

[Input] Source array.

arr_src_size

[Input] Size of  Source array.

Returns

-Returns the source array.

BG_EnableLogs
bool BG_EnableLogs()

Enable logs in library.

Returns

Returns TRUE if enabled is success otherwise returns FALSE.

BG_DisableLogs
bool BG_DisableLogs()

Disable logs in engine.

Returns

Returns TRUE if disable is success otherwise returns FALSE.
